Description:
Detects suspicious command sequence that JexBoss

Author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: JexBoss Command Sequence
Query: sourcetype like 'linux-%' eql select * from _source_ where (log like '%bash -c /bin/bash%' and log like '%&/dev/tcp/%')
